data.title: Netflix Official Site
data.meta_description: When three working-class teens enroll in an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder. Watch trailers & learn more.
data.text:
1. Welcome

57m

After a public high school collapses, the builder tries to repair its image by paying for three impacted students to attend an exclusive private school.

2. Desire

50m

A school project brings Marina and Samuel closer, and inspires Guzmán to try and win over Nadia. Meanwhile, Christian is shocked by a revelation.

3. Saturday Night

54m

Samuel throws a party, where Nano makes a move on Marina and spiked punch affects more than one couple. Nadia is hurt by what she learns about Guzmán.

4. Love is a Drug

48m

Guzmán tries to earn Nadia's forgiveness. Polo and Christian bond at a gala. Lu bribes her teacher. To pay his debt, Nano must complete a dark mission.

5. Everyone Lies

49m

Marina gives Nano a way to pay his debt. Lu intentionally leaks a secret in front of Nadia. Omar learns Ander told his friends about the two of them.

6. Everything Will Be Okay

50m

Nano learns one watch holds a secret. Marina's pot stash is found. News of a pregnancy raises suspicions. Christian is offered fame if he does a favor.

7. Everything Explodes

47m

Carla suspects Marina is involved in the theft. Omar's father makes plans for his son. After learning his sister’s secret, Guzmán seeks revenge.

8. Assilah

52m

The last moments before the murder unfold. Christian makes a tough decision. The police arrest a suspect. Guzmán becomes reckless with grief.

1. 20 hours missing

53m

New students start school at Las Encinas as Guzmán continues to mourn his sister and Christian struggles with his secret. A classmate goes missing.

2. 34 hours missing

48m

Seeking the truth about Marina's death, Samuel attempts to seduce Carla. Lu's new friend, social media guru Cayetana, hosts an impromptu party.

3. 36 hours missing

54m

Polo and Ander have a heart-to-heart. Nadia gets creative to stop Guzmán from drinking too much and doing drugs. Rebeka's mother offers Samuel a job.

4. 59 hours missing

49m

Pressured by his friends, Polo's guilt overwhelms him. Cayetana's mother threatens to reveal her secret. Ander and Guzmán argue with their partners.

5. 63 hours missing

50m

Rebeka teases Cayetana with what she's learned. The Halloween party takes a troubling turn. Samuel walks in on a shocking scene.

6. 66 hours missing

48m

Lu blackmails Nadia, and Samuel confronts Carla with his suspicions. In the future, Guzmán is interrogated about the missing student.

7. 84 hours missing

53m

Lu uncovers a secret while helping Cayetana with her fundraiser party. Omar worries about Samuel's fate. Ander's behavior confuses Guzmán.

8. 0 hours missing

51m

Painful truths and dark secrets are exposed as the students unburden themselves and the circumstances behind Samuel's disappearance are revealed.

1. Carla

49m

Carla is interrogated when a student is killed at a party. In the past, she faces Polo in court, Ander has a health worry, and Nadia meets a new suitor.

2. Samuel and Guzmán

50m

Guzmán attempts to make amends. Nadia threatens payback when she and Lu go after the same scholarship. Ander comes clean to his loved ones.

3. Cayetana and Valerio

48m

Polo is harassed at school. Samuel mulls the police's offer as he and Rebeka become closer. Ander struggles with his treatment.

4. Lu

53m

Guzmán confronts Nadia's father. New romances transpire when Lu throws a creative Valentine's Day party. Rebeka struggles with a moneymaking decision.

5. Ander

52m

Rebeka tries to identify the traitor. A blackout party at the club leads to multiple shocking revelations.

6. Rebeka

51m

The Columbia scholarship winner is announced. Nadia makes a momentous decision. Samuel's concern about Carla causes issues between him and Valerio.

7. Nadia and Omar

47m

As graduation day arrives, the futures of multiple students remain uncertain. Polo begs his mothers to reconsider their recent decision.

8. Polo

52m

The events that transpired the night of the murder unfold. The police interview several eyewitnesses who are ready to point fingers.

1. The New Order

55m

A stern principal and three new students begin at Las Encinas. Omar and Samuel must prove themselves academically while their friends try to help.

2. Five Seconds

53m

Prince Phillipe's arrival at the school prompts strict security measures and controversy. Samuel and Omar's towel party leads to new romantic hookups.

3. When Lies Dance with Temptation

54m

When Prince Phillippe hosts his famous Le Bal party, betrayals ensue. The jealousy between Guzmán and Samuel intensifies. Patrick sparks friction.

4. I'm a...

45m

Rebe is confused and hurt by Mencía's mysterious behavior. Much to Ari's chagrin, Benjamín suggests Samuel join the debate team.

5. Reintegration

47m

Ari and Samuel face off in an important and public debate. After speaking with Ander, Omar struggles with the emotional fallout.

6. I Love You All Wrong

41m

Phillippe worries that his friends are using him for Ambar Lucid performance tickets. Rebe warns Mencía she feels skeptical about Armando's assistance.

7. Before I Go (Part I)

50m

Samuel tells Ari to make her choice while Guzmán plans a romantic date. Cayetana is stunned by a realization. Mencía is backed into a corner.

8. Before I Go (Part II)

47m

The details of Ari's attack are revealed but the Las Encinas students prove yet again there is always more than meets the eye.

1. I Killed Him

48m

A new student catches Patrick's eye while another surprises Cayetana by defending Phillipe. Benjamín implements stricter measures at school.

2. Anything Goes

49m

Patrick lashes out at his dad by hosting a hedonistic party for everyone at the school. Samuel struggles with keeping both Ari and Benjamín happy.

3. Tie Me Up

45m

Tensions grow between Omar and Samuel as the students vote for someone to be expelled. Isadora tries to persuade Phillipe that she knows what's best.

4. The Body

45m

While helping her father with an auction, Mencía makes a shocking discovery. Outside of the event, Omar is surprised by what he finds in the water.

5. Please, Tell the Truth

54m

The police investigation forces Benjamín into the spotlight. Patrick finds himself in a tough spot with Iván and Cruz. Caye reconnects with a friend.

6. Can't Buy My Love

42m

The students auction off dates to raise money for Samuel's bail, but the results of the bidding cause more than one broken heart.

7. Toxic

41m

Samuel, Rebe and Cayetana look for evidence that could implicate Benjamín. Heartbroken over Phillipe's harsh words, Isadora embarks on a trip to Ibiza.

8. Your Side of the World and Mine

51m

Samu considers his next move with the SIM card, Cruz gives Iván relationship advice, and Caye tries to support a traumatized Isadora.

1. Anxiety

53m

Ari, Mencía and Patrick return to school, determined not to let their family's baggage weigh them down. Isa's new club opens with a big first night.

2. Selfies

43m

After a new development in Isa's case against her rapists, everyone has an opinion. Ari asks Nico out for a drink. Patrick makes a sacrifice.

3. Naked

49m

Isa's friends rally round — and strip down — to support her. Rocío practices a new talent. Mencía starts to wonder about Sara and Raúl's relationship.

4. War

56m

The crew turns out for Cruz's championship football match, where controversy leads to chaos — and then shocking violence. Sara makes a painful decision.

5. Mourning

61m

Javi plants an idea in Isa's head that she can't shake, while Patrick struggles to help Iván process a loss. Raúl isn't ready to let go of Saraul.Goals.

6. Tina

49m

Iván seeks emotional release, Sara slips back into old routines, and Ari goes looking for closure. When Isa proposes a collaboration, Nico has doubts.

7. Masks

46m

A Venetian Carnival night at Isadora House shows Isa a new side of Dídac and puts the students of Las Encinas on a collision course toward heartbreak.

8. Separation

56m

Still reeling from the night before, Ari takes on the heavy responsibility of protecting her siblings. Hugo's past actions finally catch up with him.

1. Las Encinas

53m

An old student is tempted to return to Las Encinas as Isadora struggles with her feelings for Dídac. Iván feels lonely — but that might change soon.

2. Protocol

50m

Chloe and Carmen are both obsessed with Iván — but for different reasons. Coach Jessica advises Sara. The mysterious academic director focuses on Dídac.

3. Bling-Bling

53m

Sara throws a steamy glitter party. Family tensions tear Dídac and Isadora apart. Rocío and Eric’s night in the squatters’ house spirals out of control.

4. Semicolon

47m

Chloe considers opening up to Eric, while Nico is worried about his cousin's behavior. Omar deals with the consequences of his past in Las Encinas.

5. The Family

47m

Sara gets Chloe's help while scheming against Raúl. Omar catches Joel and Iván in an awkward situation. Carmen makes a bold move.

6. At Rock Bottom

52m

Isadora makes tough decisions in the family business. Luis' investigation is threatened. Deception leaves Chloe in a vulnerable place.

7. Just Hug Me

58m

Raúl manipulates Sara's revenge to his advantage. Iván’s presence puts Omar and Joel’s relationship in a very confusing place.

8. I'm Gonna End This Forever

61m

A new death shocks the students of Las Encinas. Iván makes a last-minute proposal to Joel, while Isadora must decide what to do with her parents.
